name: Movies with "Little" in the Title! Quiz / Test | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: A family decides to adopt a mouse, but the family's cat has a different plan for the newest addition to the family. This 1999 movie stars Hugh Laurie and Geena Davis as the parents of the mouse.
questions.explanation:
Stuart Little.

	"Stuart Little" is based on the novel by E. B. White. Michael J. Fox provides the voice for Stuart in this film and two of the sequels that have been released through to 2006. Other stars of the movie include Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie, and Jonathon Lipnicki.

questions.text: Seymour Krelborn discovers a rare plant that grows and grows, but only on human blood. This plant becomes a main attraction and gets Seymour noticed by the girl of his dreams.
questions.explanation:
Little Shop of Horrors.

	"Little Shop of Horrors" is a musicial that was originally written in 1960 by Charles B. Griffith. This 1986 version has an all-star cast which includes Steve Martin, John Candy, Bill Murray, and Ellen Greene.

questions.text: An American gets the opportunity to go to London to see his brother only to get dumped off at a game show. However, he quickly becomes mistaken for a spy and winds up doing things he never knew he had the courage to do. This 1997 comedy co-stars Joanne Whalley as Lorelei.
questions.correct: The Man Who Knew Too Little
questions.explanation:
The Man Who Knew Too Little.

	Bill Murray stars as Wally Ritchie in this comedy crime caper that is directed by Jon Amiel. Wally becomes entangled in a plot of international proportions that includes murder and mayhem, all the while thinking it is part of a game that he is playing.

questions.text: Peter, Michael, and Jack race to England to stop Mary from being sent to boarding school. This sequel finds our bachelors trying to stop their favorite little girl's mother from marrying the wrong man. What "Little" film is being described?
questions.correct: Three Men and a Little Lady
questions.explanation:
Three Men and a Little Lady.

	Emile Ardolino of "Dirty Dancing" fame directs this comedy.The 1990 sequel to "Three Men and a Baby" grossed over $70,000,000 in the United States, but was no match for the original which grossed over $167,000,000.

questions.text: This film is based on a popular series of theatrical shorts about a bunch of crazy kids. Daryl Hannah, Lea Thompson and Whoopi Goldberg star in this 1994 film version.
questions.explanation:
The Little Rascals.

	"The Little Rascals" finds the TV series "Our Gang" members up to their old antics. Alfalfa has promised to stop courting Darla, but when a rich kid moves in the neighborhood and takes his place, all bets are off. "The Little Rascals" was a moderate hit at the box-office in the U.S. grossing over $56,000,000.

questions.text: Stacy Holt steals her boyfriend's palm pilot and discovers that he still has all of his old girlfriends' phone numbers. She then goes on a rampage, trying to find out personal things about these women so that she can learn more about her boyfriend. What comedy is this?
questions.explanation:
Little Black Book.

	Brittany Murphy stars as Stacy Holt, a young producer of a talk show, who is coerced into prying into her boyfriend's private life by her co-workers. One thing that Stacy doesn't plan on is befriending one of her boyfriend's ex-flames. Kathy Bates and Holly Hunter also star in this film.

questions.text: Stanley Banks has just learned that his daughter is going to make him a grandfather. What is this sequel to the 1950 classic "Father of the Bride"?
questions.explanation:
Father's Little Dividend.

	Spencer Tracy stars as Stanley Banks, a father who must come to terms with the fact that his only daughter is getting married in the original "Father of the Bride". In this sequel he must now learn that he will become a grandpa. Steve Martin starred in the updated version of "Father of the Bride" in 1991 and its sequel in 1995 "Father of the Bride Part II".

questions.text: A young chicken tries to warn his town that aliens are going to invade. No one believes him and his reputation gets tarnished.  When aliens actually do invade he gets the credit he has been longing for. Can you name this animated film?
questions.explanation:
Chicken Little.

	There is an all-star cast for this 2005 smash hit. Cast members include Zach Braff, Don Knotts, Gary Marshall, Joan Cusack, and Steve Zahn. "Chicken Little" took in over $135,000,000 in the United States during its theatrical release.

questions.text: Brian Stevenson has discovered a world of monsters in his room and they live underneath his bed! What "Little" movie am I talking about?
questions.explanation:
Little Monsters.

	Fred and Ben Savage star in this fantasy film from 1989. This plot takes the boys on an underground adventure into the world of monsters. Along the way they discover that monsters aren't so scary after all.

questions.text: Two young teenage girls compete while they are at summer camp to see who will lose their virginity first. Can you name this Tatum O'Neal and Kristy McNichol comedy from 1980?
options: The Best Little Whore House in Texas
questions.explanation:
Little Darlings.

	This comedy co-stars Matt Dillon, Nicolas Coster, and Cynthia Nixon. Kristy McNichol took up smoking for her role of Angel, but couldn't kick the habit after filming ended.
